scroll.headline: Hello, I'm Mayuri,
scroll.subHeadline: Crafting Blissful Minds, One Breath at a Time
scroll.subHeadline1: Your Guide to Inner Serenity and Mindful Living.
scroll.info: Let us embark on a simplified, transformative journey together. With roots in the spiritual heartland of India, I've embarked on a two-decade journey spanning continents. Join me as wecraft blissful minds through breath and meditation.
scroll.info1: With two decades of exploring the realms of the mind and emotions across continents, I'm here to share and simplify your journey toward inner bliss. Join me as we breathe life intomindfulness and meditation, drawing inspiration from the spiritual heart of India.

scroll4.headline2: Join me in an upcoming program.
scroll4.bodyCopy: An antidote to modern-day stressors, these programs invite you to centre yourself with holistic healing practices inspired from ancient Indian wisdom.

scroll5.headline: Live a life of intention
scroll5.bodyCopy: Alan Cohen said, “When the intention is clear, so is the way.” This newsletter is a nudge to live an intentional life and to show up for yourself with compassion. Make it a monthly practice to feed your inner life with the best in spirituality, growth, and healing.

scroll6.headline: Thrive Together in the Community
scroll6.subHeadline: A Space for Growth, Support, and Transformation
scroll6.cardBody1: Join a legion of kindred souls who open their hearts and minds, sharing personal stories of healing, self-growth, and transformation.
scroll6.cardBody2: Immerse yourself in a robust community, where regular check-ins nurture growth. Expect encouragement, accountability, and motivation as we embark on this journey together.

point1.head: Inquisitive Beginnings
point1.body: Born and raised in India, the land of spiritual wonders, I've always been a curious soul, eager to unravel the mysteries of spirituality, emotions, and the human mind.

point2.head: Breath of Transformation
point2.body: My journey took a pivotal turn during my engineering days when I stumbled upon a life-altering breathing and meditation program offered by the Art of Living. Drawing guidance and inspiration from the footsteps of my master, little did I know that this moment would set the course for a lifelong exploration.

point3.head: Becoming a Guide
point3.body: : In 2008, I ventured into a new chapter as a meditation and breathwork teacher. Over the years, I've had the privilege of sharing these transformative practices with diverse communities, from corporate settings to university campuses and serene meditation centers

point4.head: A Tech-Infused Twist
point4.body: Adding a unique twist to my journey, I pursued a Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology, blending the spiritual with the technological. Working in a corporate world as well for almost two decades, I have a first hand experience of the challenges we all through on a daily basis

point5.head: Hidden Passions
point5.body: Beyond the well-known facets, there are some secrets not many are aware of. I'm not just a meditation enthusiast; I'm also deeply immersed in the world of Ayurveda and hold formal training in Vedic astrology. These pursuits have provided profound insights into the patterns of human behavior and the influence of celestial forces on our lives.

scroll1.1stToggle: Bachelors of Engineering in Information Technology.
scroll1.2ndToggle: Conducted 200+ Mind & Meditation workshops in leading corporates & universities
scroll1.3rdToggle: Partner at the learning platform, Inner Cord
scroll1.4thTogggle: Always planning a trip in my free time

journey.head: The Spark Ignition
journey.body: A pivotal moment marked the beginning of it all. It was the first step toward understanding the intricate world of spirituality, emotions, and the human mind.

journey.head: The Birth of a Vision
journey.body: Inspired by my own personal growth, I envisioned a startup that would bring these transformative practices to the world, nurturing well-being and inner peace.

journey.head: Execution to achieve
journey.body: By July dedicated to simplifying the journey to inner bliss through meditation and breathwork. It was a moment of excitement and purpose.

journey.head: Expanding Horizons
journey.body: I intend to share these ancient practices with diverse communities, leaving a trail of mindfulness and serenity in our wake.

journey.head: Looking Ahead
journey.body: Today, as we stand at the cusp of a new year, my journey continues. With each breath and meditation session, we craft a brighter, more fulfilled tomorrow for ourselves and those who join us.

scroll2.heading: Here’s a little roadmap of things that has helped me find my true north
scroll2.subBody1: This is how it all began. Learning to ask questions that go beyond the surface was my initiation into spiritual enquiry.
scroll2.subBody2: I followed my curiosity by researching extensively on the science of emotions and the human mind. Psychology became not just an interest but a soul-calling.
scroll2.subBody3: The wisdom in Ayurveda is the wisdom of not just plants and medicines, it’s the wisdom of life. Being an Ayurveda enthusiast, I have rooted myself in a plant-based lifestyle that nurtures my wellbeing holistically.
scroll2.subBody4: Vedic astrology is the ancient science of stars. And learning about it has helped me understand how the cosmic energy has a pull on us just like gravity.
scroll2.subBody5: This might seem simple, but the art of breathing has been one of my constant anchors in life. Allowing my breath to flow is how I align with the divine.
scroll2.subBody6: Devoting myself to meditation early in life pointed me towards my passion, my purpose. The lessons learned in these sessions have made me who I am today.
